title: Here's everything to expect from Fed Chair Powell's speech Friday in Jackson Hole
content: For all the attention being paid to the speech, the chances of it containing any new news seem remote.
summary: For all the attention being paid to the speech, the chances of it containing any new news seem remote.

title: FDA approves updated Pfizer, Moderna Covid vaccines as virus surges; shots to be available within days
content: The Covid jabs target a strain called KP.2, a descendant of the highly contagious omicron subvariant JN.1 that began circulating widely in the U.S. this year.
summary: The Covid jabs target a strain called KP.2, a descendant of the highly contagious omicron subvariant JN.1 that began circulating widely in the U.S. this year.

title: Kamala Harris to accept Democratic nomination on Day 4 of DNC. Here's who else is speaking
content: Vice President Kamala Harris became the Democratic nominee in the race against Republican Donald Trump after President Joe Biden dropped his reelection bid.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris became the Democratic nominee in the race against Republican Donald Trump after President Joe Biden dropped his reelection bid.

title: Peloton shares soar 35% as turnaround plan takes hold, losses shrink
content: Peloton has been working to generate free cash flow and return to profitability, and has made cuts to sales and marketing budgets to improve its balance sheet.
summary: Peloton has been working to generate free cash flow and return to profitability, and has made cuts to sales and marketing budgets to improve its balance sheet.

title: Mike Lynch, man once dubbed 'Britain's Bill Gates,' dies at age 59
content: Mike Lynch, who had just recently won a landmark U.S. fraud trial, was found dead in the wreckage of a yacht that sank off the coast of Sicily. He was 59.
summary: Mike Lynch, who had just recently won a landmark U.S. fraud trial, was found dead in the wreckage of a yacht that sank off the coast of Sicily. He was 59.

title: Former FTX exec Ryan Salame's romantic partner indicted on campaign finance crimes
content: Michelle Bond was charged two months before her romantic partner, former FTX exec Ryan Salame, is due to surrender to being a prison sentence.
summary: Michelle Bond was charged two months before her romantic partner, former FTX exec Ryan Salame, is due to surrender to being a prison sentence.

title: Perplexity AI plans to start running ads in fourth quarter as AI-assisted search gains popularity
content: Following months of controversy surrounding plagiarism allegations, Perplexity AI is about to start selling ads alongside AI-assisted search results.
summary: Following months of controversy surrounding plagiarism allegations, Perplexity AI is about to start selling ads alongside AI-assisted search results.

title: These are the 10 best 'workcation' cities in the world for hybrid workers

title: Corporate loyalty does not pay off, HR expert says, as job hopping gains currency among young people
content: Just 23% of workers aged 42 and under expressed strong interest in staying with their companies long-term, according to a study by WorkProud.
summary: Just 23% of workers aged 42 and under expressed strong interest in staying with their companies long-term, according to a study by WorkProud.

title: Zoom stock has best day in almost 2 years on quarterly results, increased guidance

title: Canadian rail shutdown leaves billions in U.S. trade stranded, with economic impact to grow day by day

title: GM-owned Cruise will partner with Uber to offer driverless rides
content: Uber and Cruise have agreed to a multiyear partnership with the embattled AV company planning to offer driverless rides to Uber users as soon as next year.

title: Snowflake shares sink 14% on decelerating product revenue growth
content: Shares of Snowflake fell after it released fiscal second-quarter 2025 earnings that showed decelerating product revenue growth compared to past quarters.

content: Deutsche Bank has reached a settlement with the bulk of claims in the Postbank suit, which have been hanging over the bank for years.

title: China's self-driving startup WeRide delays U.S. IPO as deadline looms

title: Home sales rose in July for the first time in five months
content: At the end of the month there were 1.33 million homes on the market, an increase of 0.8% from June and 19.8% higher than July 2023.
summary: At the end of the month there were 1.33 million homes on the market, an increase of 0.8% from June and 19.8% higher than July 2023.

title: Oil tanker abandoned, adrift and ablaze after Red Sea attack

title: What a Harris election victory could mean for Europe and the trans-Atlantic relationship

title: U.S. job growth revised down by the most since 2009. Why this time is different

title: Asia markets mostly rise as investors assess business activity data from the region and Fed minutes
